StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress010A:
[UE:Meta key="9a0535853fa24d8d976e588880b75b1b" Scale="1"/]Rescue Corps HQ lost contact with the team sent to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
so you were tapped for an [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]emergency mission [System:Color name="Default"]to track them down.
What could have happened to such a capable rescue team?
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress020A:
[UE:Meta key="e0c8431e97f5498e9c9788dc43218149" Scale="1"/]Immediately upon landing, Rescue Pup [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] rushed to greet you.
Together you found [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] unconscious on the ground! When he came to,
he explained the rescue team's current predicament. With high hopes of
finding the other Rescue Officers, you all [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]set out for the S.S. Shepherd[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress030A:
[UE:Meta key="c6f8b4fe6db24deda117c7f89f319770" Scale="1"/]Passing through the cave was just supposed to lead you to the
S.S. Shepherd, but when you boldly leaped in, you encountered a
terrified Rescue Officer surrounded by strange creatures. To make
matters worse, that officer is the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]captain[System:Color name="Default"]! Time for another rescue!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress040A:
[UE:Meta key="b7da1244837a4bbb89637f9a9673723b" Scale="1"/]To the captain's relief, you saved her from the creatures surrounding
her. Luckily, she knows how to reach the ship from there, and the four
of you [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]continue on your way to the S.S. Shepherd[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress050A:
[UE:Meta key="0708b75c247741c0bc31037e4c95aa0a" Scale="1"/]You made it to the S.S. Shepherd, but there were no signs of the other
Rescue Officers. What's more, with the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]energy tank empty[System:Color name="Default"], you can't
use the radar to find them. Escaping this planet is now the least of your
concerns. How will you find the other castaways?
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress060A:
[UE:Meta key="85ccb833a0d74bbfb199b911201ea3a6" Scale="1"/]Thanks to the puzzling Pikmin creatures you encountered, you managed
to collect some treasure that could be converted into an energy source
for the S.S. Shepherd. With the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]radar back online[System:Color name="Default"], you begin your search
for the other castaways in earnest, using their SOS signals to guide you.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress070A:
[UE:Meta key="8da77cb773bb4c2181463ae63ce87cdd" Scale="1"/]Guided by the reactivated radar, you started exploring a new area
and soon found a castaway deep within another cave. After getting
them out of there safely, you discovered it was the team's [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]scientist[System:Color name="Default"],
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Another Rescue Officer is back in the fold!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress080A:
[UE:Meta key="73d440acc99c49d9828f6c003529b4cd" Scale="1"/]The whereabouts of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]3 Rescue Officers[System:Color name="Default"] are still unknown. During your
search, you were surprised to find an unidentified castaway. Apparently,
the Rescue Officers and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] aren't the only castaways
stranded on this mysterious planet.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress100A:
[UE:Meta key="957ffcc206374818a34843177a2b9f9e" Scale="1"/]Science aficionado [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] figured out how to make use of the raw
materials scattered around the planet! What's more, you saved the
Rescue Corps's gruff ranger, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Only [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]2 more Rescue Officers
[System:Color name="Default"]remain at large: the doctor and the pilot.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress100B:
[UE:Meta key="28eb7e66375e4183a922532f24f3fb39" Scale="1"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s story, the "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leaflings[System:Color name="Default"]"—beings with leaves growing
out of their heads—are attacking castaways and turning them into
leaflings too. He believes the missing pilot could be a victim himself!
You need to get back out there and find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress150A:
[UE:Meta key="be88a39da5a946c795edaa2144c96102" Scale="1"/]The energy supply for the S.S. Shepherd continues to grow, and you've
traversed even more of the planet. During your explorations, you located
the missing doctor, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Only [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]1 Rescue Officer is still out there—
the pilot[System:Color name="Default"]. But has he been turned into a leafling?
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress160A:
[UE:Meta key="0c650dbe46b14da49ae70e5e05b190e0" Scale="1"/]Could the leafling you rescued be the pilot you've been searching for?
The only way to know for sure is to have [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] examine them and,
hopefully, [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]come up with a way to cure their leafy condition[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress170A:
[UE:Meta key="ad5fc24bd8d84cb4bb0e9802aafbeba3" Scale="1"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], to cure the castaways with leaves growing out of
their heads, he requires a special medicinal ingredient that is extracted
from "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lumiknolls[System:Color name="Default"]," which only appear at night. The risk is high, but you
have no choice. You need to go on a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night expedition[System:Color name="Default"]!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress180A:
[UE:Meta key="1159e8f89bcd4e70bd494ba417c39f02" Scale="1"/]Using the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"] procured during your night expedition,
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was able to cure the rescued leafling! However, the
team's celebration was quickly cut short by the realization
that the castaway they had cured wasn't the pilot after all.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress190A:
[UE:Meta key="dc5b05eaea534e8f8a71aae2cd97a5b9" Scale="1"/]This newly rescued leafling may just be the missing pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
But to find out, you'll need more [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap [System:Color name="Default"]to create the cure and
restore them to their non-leafy state. You'll have to make time for
a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night expedition[System:Color name="Default"] while continuing to search for more leaflings.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress200A:
[UE:Meta key="55c1596598d24cfa9a08e4c721dd0034" Scale="1"/]Is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] simply moving from place to place? Is he even a leafling
at all? As the questions pile up, the team decides to not only rescue
and cure any leaflings you find but to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]locate that one leafling who
keeps slipping through your fingers[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress320A:
[UE:Meta key="132ad57348e149dc9360de5cabc3e944" Scale="1"/]You found [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], the pilot! Now the original mission to find and rescue
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can begin in earnest. Sadly, none of the SOS signals
match the location mentioned in [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s last Voyage Log entry. You'll
need to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]finish repairing the S.S. Shepherd[System:Color name="Default"] to expand the radar's range.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress340A:
[UE:Meta key="cc8db6e7379145b0aa75767b9c0f0d33" Scale="1"/]One mission remains: rescue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. According to the
Voyage Log, he had been searching for ship parts [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]inside a large
structure [System:Color name="Default"]in the exact area where a new SOS signal was recently
picked up. It has to be him!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress360A:
[UE:Meta key="1cfa9d72d7a342ca93d8f03ef977315a" Scale="1"/]After opening the locked bunker in Hero's Hideaway, you found
something interesting inside... The[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] leafling you've been looking for
[System:Color name="Default"]lying in wait! Could they be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress370A:
[UE:Meta key="05fb39a378764b90a66784fe1eb4676b" Scale="1"/]You emerged victorious in the final Dandori Battle against the leafling
presumed to be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Now it's time to bring them back to
the Rescue Command Post and return them to their [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]original form[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress380A:
[UE:Meta key="804618bbbc204caba4d5bc05dbc9f64f" Scale="1"/]Could that leafling you rescued really be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]? If that is their
true identity, once you restore him to his non-leafy state, the Rescue
Corps's mission will be complete! All that stands in the way now is a
dangerous [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night expedition [System:Color name="Default"]to harvest glow sap for the cure.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress400A:
[UE:Meta key="fec2513c968a4752b5483b66892db103" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]You rescued [System:Color name="Default"][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! With all the Rescue Officers
and other rescued castaways on board, the S.S. Shepherd
can finally depart this strange and dangerous planet.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress500A:
[UE:Meta key="baee5c98702847f39b1c7d81883f5ec6" Scale="1"/]Having rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], you were on your way home, when [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
suddenly started showing signs of distress! You turned back to find the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Koppaite veterinarian[System:Color name="Default"] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], who might know how to help poor [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress530A:
[UE:Meta key="5ca5e7d2de024fb88ccfa22fb95af126" Scale="1"/]Soon after setting out for a new area to look for the veterinarian [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
you came upon [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s subordinate, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. They
made off with a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]castaway that looked a lot like a Koppaite[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress540A:
[UE:Meta key="4531846641a14707bd9c6affb773a536" Scale="1"/]You located [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Though you tried to convince them to hand
over the castaway, they ignored you and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]fled into a cave[System:Color name="Default"]. Don't lose your
best chance at curing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] now!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress550A:
[UE:Meta key="c144f1fdbfbd41e384d3fbfb93846dfd" Scale="1"/]After you defeated [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] in a Dandori Battle, he and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] ran off
together, leaving the castaway behind. The castaway appears to
be a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Koppaite[System:Color name="Default"]. Their rescue is now your top priority!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress560A:
[UE:Meta key="28626dd67a8d4f929a0eccb5b367f071" Scale="1"/]The rescued castaway was indeed a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Koppaite[System:Color name="Default"]! As they might have
information about the veterinarian [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], the team decides to start
asking questions as soon as they wake up.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress570A:
[UE:Meta key="06219a36d8c24934b99e7728a5b03dc3" Scale="1"/]The rescued Koppaite was one of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companions! She and two
others were split up shortly after arriving on the planet. Next you'll
visit Giant's Hearth to search for the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]remaining 2[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress610A:
[UE:Meta key="50d3399314094178b1fc158a40139ef1" Scale="1"/]Another Koppaite was found and rescued. You have to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] the
veterinarian ASAP—for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s own sake and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s. You head back to
the Rescue Command Post to ask the Koppaite about [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]her whereabouts[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress620A:
[UE:Meta key="4860a52d4240464d9b2c590618e3e047" Scale="1"/]According to what the two Koppaites told you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was dragged [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deep
into the forest[System:Color name="Default"] by a giant doglike creature. You'll need to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]upgrade the
radar even more [System:Color name="Default"]to continue your search for the veterinarian.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress660A:
[UE:Meta key="eae451f727f340e2b2578ce11d11b3a9" Scale="1"/]You located the veterinarian [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! But no sooner did you find her than
she was [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dragged away[System:Color name="Default"] again by [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. You're determined to
get her back to cure poor [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], no matter what it takes.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress670A:
[UE:Meta key="b9d9b235bc904695bfb8df897d797d6d" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] escaped again, dragging [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] into a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cave [System:Color name="Default"]with them.
You don't know what their goal is, but it doesn't look like they want to
let her go anytime soon.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress680A:
[UE:Meta key="4bd1f01a51824191a2916c90e2bdf119" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] escaped, but thankfully he left [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] behind. As [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
heads for the Rescue Command Post at [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s command, you need
to hurry up and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]rescue[System:Color name="Default"] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] so she can treat [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress700A:
[UE:Meta key="50a3001ecca74c8fa098958a710d333d" Scale="1"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]giant dog [System:Color name="Default"]that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is pursuing is most likely the creature that
kidnapped [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. To cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], she'll need the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] cells of that dog[System:Color name="Default"], since
it doesn't have a leaf tail. Clinging to a sliver of hope, you head out to
continue your search in the Primordial Thicket.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress720A:
[UE:Meta key="9e337a9492cd4f2eb8a2d7e25ca552e1" Scale="1"/]You found [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s journal next to a cave deep in the woods. This cave
looks like it might be the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] giant dog's den[System:Color name="Default"]. If so, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the giant dog
are sure to be inside!
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress730A:
[UE:Meta key="0c197139dcdf4f5381de7546b9aec8be" Scale="1"/]While searching the giant dog's den, you happened upon a lurking [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Ignoring your calls, he disappeared into the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] back of the cave[System:Color name="Default"].
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress760A:
[UE:Meta key="97f0f62801c8405ab4afa5a574939a47" Scale="1"/]Just when you thought you had [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] cornered in the deepest level of
the cave, he got on a terrifyingly giant dog and attacked! To get your
hands on the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] dog's cells[System:Color name="Default"], you'll have to find some way to quell its rage.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress770A:
[UE:Meta key="4ac8ad594104414dbb66441c47db6b7d" Scale="1"/]The giant dog fled, leaving behind its collar and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Using the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dog's
cells [System:Color name="Default"]left on its collar, you should have what you need to cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
You also have an unconscious [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. It's time to return to the Rescue
Command Post.
StoryOutline.StoryOutline_Progress900A:
[UE:Meta key="57471efebc874e018b3c5d04f585c43f" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail is back to its fluffy self! You can set off into space anytime,
but there may be some [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]unfinished business[System:Color name="Default"] left to complete on this
planet. If you're not in a rush, you may as well explore for a little longer...
